title: Brookula strebeli
text:
Brookula strebeli is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a marine <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> unassigned in the <a href="superfamily%20%28biology%29">superfamily</a> <a href="Seguenzioidea">Seguenzioidea</a>.
Description.
The maximum recorded size of the shell is 1.54 mm.
Distribution.
This species occurs in <a href="subantarctic">subantarctic</a> waters off the <a href="South%20Georgia%20Islands">South Georgia Islands</a>.
